import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/Contact.css'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [formStatus, setFormStatus] = useState({ message: '', type: '', // 'success' or 'error' loading: false }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prevData => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setFormStatus({ message: '', type: '', loading: true }); // Simulate API call try { await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); // Success response simulation setFormStatus({ message: 'Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.', type: 'success', loading: false }); // Reset form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); } catch (error) { setFormStatus({ message: 'Something went wrong. Please try again later.', type: 'error', loading: false }); } }; return (

Find Us

Map Loading...

123 Education Street, Learning District, New Delhi

Connect With Us

{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

How can I enroll in a course?

To enroll in a course, simply browse our courses section, select the course you're interested in, and click on the "Enroll Now" button. Follow the instructions to complete your registration and payment.

What is your refund policy?

We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for all our courses. If you're not satisfied with the course content within the first week, you can request a full refund through our support team.

How long do I have access to a course after enrollment?

Once you enroll in a course, you will have lifetime access to the course materials, including any future updates to the content.

Do you provide certificates upon course completion?

Yes, we provide digital certificates for all courses upon successful completion. These certificates can be downloaded and shared on your professional profiles.

Can I access the courses on mobile devices?

Yes, our platform is fully responsive and optimized for mobile learning. You can access your courses on smartphones, tablets, laptops, or desktop computers.

Do you offer discounts for group enrollments?

Yes, we offer special discounts for group enrollments. If you're looking to enroll multiple students or employees, please contact our support team for custom pricing options.

); }; export default Contact;
